scripts.custom-build: npm run install-browser && npm run build && npm run build-ui
scripts.install-browser: npm install && apt-get update && apt-get install -y wget gnupg && wget -q -O - https://dl-ssl.google.com/linux/linux_signing_key.pub | apt-key add - && sh -c 'echo "deb [arch=amd64] http://dl.google.com/linux/chrome/deb/ stable main" >> /etc/apt/sources.list.d/google.list' && apt-get update && apt-get install -y google-chrome-stable fonts-ipafont-gothic fonts-wqy-zenhei fonts-thai-tlwg fonts-kacst fonts-freefont-ttf libxss1 --no-install-recommends
scripts.build-ui: cd ui && npm install && npm run build && rm -rf ../dist/public && mkdir -p ../dist/public && cp -r dist/* ../dist/public
